name: switchboard
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a piece of equipment, used especially in the past, for directing all the phone calls made to and from a particular building or area: Tearful fans jammed the radio station's switchboard after the singer's death (= so many people called that all the phones were busy). Ask the switchboard operator for the extension number you require.
